name: Deep Cleaning (1st Clean)
description: Our deep cleaning removes hidden dirt and grime, leaving your home spotless and refreshed. Perfect for seasonal cleans or a fresh start!

name: Standard Cleaning
description: Our standard cleaning keeps your home fresh and tidy with routine dusting, vacuuming, and surface wiping. It’s the perfect way to maintain a clean, comfortable space without the hassle!

name: Monthly Premium Clean
description: Our monthly premium cleaning provides a thorough, top-to-bottom refresh, tackling dust, grime, and buildup in every corner. Enjoy a consistently pristine home without the effort—just relax and let us handle the deep cleaning!
points: Like our standard clean, but more thorough

name: Move In/Out Cleaning
description: Our move-in/out cleaning ensures your old or new home is spotless and ready for the next chapter. We deep clean every corner, removing dust, grime, and buildup, so you can move stress-free and focus on what matters most!
points: Deep cleaning of the entire property
Attention to areas that are often overlooked
